Artefact.Name: Sword of Striking
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: +1 to Hit
Artefact.Description: +1 to Hit

Artefact.Name: Sword of Battle
Artefact.Description: +1 Attack

Artefact.Name: Sword of Might
Artefact.Description: +1 Strenght

Artefact.Name: Biting Blade
Artefact.Description: -1 Armour save

Artefact.Name: Enchanted shield
Artefact.Description: 5+ Armour save

Artefact.Name: Talisman of Protection
Artefact.Description: 6+ ward save

Artefact.Name: Dispell Scroll
Artefact.Description: automatically dispel an enemy spell, one use only

Artefact.Name: Power Stone
Artefact.Description: +2 dice to cast a spell

Artefact.Name: Staff of Sorcery
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: +1 to dispell
Artefact.Description: +1 to dispell

Artefact.Name: War Banner
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: +1 Combat Resolution
Artefact.Description: +1 Combat Resolution

Artefact.Name: Chaos Daemon Sword
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: The wielder has WS, S, I and A as the Greater Daemon of their patron god. With a Mark of Chaos only (except the Mark of Chaos Undivided)
Artefact.Description: A character with a Daemon Sword has the same WS, S, I and A as the Greater Daemon of their patron god (eg, a Champion of Khorne would have Weapon Skill 10, Strength 7, Initiative 10 and Attacks 7). However, every roll of a I to hit in close combat means that the attack is resolved against the character instead of the enemy. Furthermore, the character can never re-roll an unmodified 1 to hit in close combat, regardless of the source of the re-roll.

Artefact.Name: Sword of Change
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Roll a D6 every time an enemy character or monster is slain by the Sword of Change. On a 4+ the model is turned into a Chaos Spawn (with only D3 Wounds) controlled by the Chaos player
Artefact.Description: Roll a D6 every time an enemy character or monster is slain by the Sword of Change. On a roll of 1, 2 or 3 nothing happens. On a roll of 4 or more, the model is turned into a Chaos Spawn controlled by the Chaos player! Replace the model with a Chaos Spawn model. If you do not have a spare Chaos Spawn model the model is slain, but the sword has no additional effect. If the enemy is in a unit, dien the Spawn model is placed in contact with the unit on one of its free sides (bearer's choice) and will fight as normal in subsequent combat rounds. The Chaos Spawn starts with only D3 Wounds.

Artefact.Name: Hellfire sword
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: flaming
Artefact.Description: Flaming attacks, D6 additional wounds with no armour saves

Artefact.Name: Chaos Runesword
Artefact.Description: The wielder gains +1 Weapon Skill, +1 Strength and +1 Attack.

Artefact.Name: Whip of Pleasure
Artefact.Description: The wielder gains + 1 Attack, but he cannot carry a shield or banner. In addition, the wielder always strikes first in close combat. If any of the wielder's opponents also always strike first, revert to normal Initiative.

Artefact.Name: Berserker sword
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Half the Unit Strength of all enemy models in base contact as additional Attacks
Artefact.Description: The wielder of the Berserker Sword may make additional attacks in every Close Combat phase. The number of additional attacks is equal to half the Unit Strength of all enemy models in base contact (rounding up). For example, a character in contact with two Ogres (combined Unit Strength of 6) would get 3 additional Attacks. If the bearer is involved in a challenge, only the Unit Strength of the opponent is counted.

Artefact.Name: Rending sword
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Wounded model loses not one but D3 wounds
Artefact.Description: A model wounded by the Rending Sword (after saves, etc) loses not one but D3 wounds.

Artefact.Name: Blade of Blood
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: For each unsaved wound which the Blade of Blood causes, the wielder gains +1 Wound by Strength test
Artefact.Description: For each unsaved wound which the Blade of Blood causes, the wielder may take a Strength test. If the test is passed, the wielder gains +1 Wound. This may not increase his Wounds value above double its normal number of Wounds. If the test is tailed, the wielder loses one Wound.

Artefact.Name: Filth Mace
Artefact.Description: All attacks with the Filth Mace count as poisoned attacks In addition, if the bearer of the mace kills an enemy character in close combat, he will cause terror for the rest of the game.

Artefact.Name: Soul Cleaver
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Any wounded model must pass a Toughness test or suffer an additional wound (with no saves allowed)
Artefact.Description: Any model wounded by the Soul Cleaver (after saves, etc) must pass a Toughness test or suffer an additional wound (with no saves allowed).

Artefact.Name: Axe of Khorn
Artefact.Description: Confers on the bearer the Killing Blow ability.

Artefact.Name: Spelleater Shield
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Magic Resistance(2)
Roll a D6 each time a spell is dispelled. On a roll of 4+ the spell is destroyed and the enemy Wizard may not cast it for the rest of the battle.
Artefact.Description: The Spelleater Shield is treated like a normal shield. In addition, it grants Magic Resistance (2) to the character and any unit he is with. Roll a D6 each time a spell is cast at the bearer of the Spelleater Shield and is dispelled. On a roll of 4 or more, the spell is destroyed and the enemy Wizard mav not cast it for the rest of the battle.

Artefact.Name: Chaos Runeshield
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Runeshiel negates the power of any magic weapons carried by models in base contac.
Artefact.Description: The Chaos Runeshield is treated like a normal shield. It also negates the power of any magic weapons carried by models in base contact - treat them as ordinary non-magical weapons of their type.

Artefact.Name: Armour of Tortured Souls
Artefact.Description: The Armour of Tortured Souls is a suit of Chaos armour. The wearer counts as having +1 Toughness against mundane attacks (not against spells, magic items, etc).

Artefact.Name: Armour of Damnation
Artefact.Description: The Armour of Damnation is a suit of Chaos armour. In addition, any model attacking the wearer in close combat must re-roll successful rolls to hit.

Artefact.Name: Bone Shield
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Strength 4 hit for each successful armour save
Artefact.Description: The Bane Shield is treated like a normal shield. In addition, for each successful armour save in close combat, the shield inflicts a Strength 4 hit on the model that struck the blow.

Artefact.Name: Crimson Armour of Dargan
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Strength 4 hit for each successful armour save
Artefact.Description: The Crimson Armour is a suit of Chaos armour. In addition, any model wishing to attack the wearer in close combat must first pass a Leadership test or they may not attack that combat round.

Artefact.Name: The Beguiling Gem
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Enemy models in base contact must pass a Leadership test or may not make any attacks that round and any attacks made against this models will hit automatically
Artefact.Description: All enemy models in base contact with the bearer of the Beguiling Gem must take a Leadership test at the start of every Close Combat phase. Any model which fails is transfixed and may not make any attacks that round, and any attacks made against it by the bearer will hit automatically.

Artefact.Name: Amulet of Chaos
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Enemy models must pass a Strength test or lose one wound
Artefact.Description: At the start of every Chaos Magic phase, any enemy models in contact with the wearer must pass a Strength test or lose one wound, with no armour saves allowed.

Artefact.Name: GoldenEye of Tzeentch
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Ward save of 3+ against all normal and magical missiles
Artefact.Description: The model and his mount have a Ward save of 3+ against all normal and magical missiles.

Artefact.Name: Gaze of the Gods
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: If the model is fleeing at the start of a Chaos Magic phase he is turned into a Chaos Spawn
Artefact.Description: The model gains a 4+ Ward save. If the model is fleeing at the start of a Chaos Magic phase, for any reason, the wrath of the Chaos gods is immediately visited upon him and he is turned into a Chaos Spawn, with the same number of wounds remaining as the character had. If you do not have a Spawn model to replace the character then he simply counts as slain. For Victory points purposes, the character is not counted as slain or below half Wounds unless the Spawn he has turned into is slain or is below half Wounds.

Artefact.Name: Collar of Khorne
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Magic Resistance (2)
Artefact.Description: The model has Magic Resistance (2).

Artefact.Name: Blade of The Ether
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Daemon ignore armour saves in close combat
Artefact.Description: Daemon ignore armour saves in close combat

Artefact.Name: Axe of Khorne
Artefact.Description: Daemon with an Axe gains the Killing Blow ability

Special.SpecialRuleDescription: Ward save cannot be used against magical attacks
Enemy unit in base contact reduces Ld by -1 to minimum Ld value of 2
Any model in base contact halve WS and Initiative (rounding up)
May re-roll one dice per turn except one that has already been re-rolled
May automatically dispel one enemy spell per battle, except if cast with Irresistible Force. In addition roll a D6. On a 4+ enemy Wizard loses knowledge of the spell
Knows one more lore of Tzeentch spell than normally allowed
Any unit in close combat wiih a Cloud of Flies suffers a -1 modifier on its rolls to hit
In Chaos player's Shooting phase if Daemon is not in combat it may unleash Stream of Corruption - Breath attack, Strength 3 with -2 armour saving throw modifier
Breath attack Strength 3 with a -2 armour modifier
